title: Dinosaur National Monument: Donations
body: Donations       Your tax-deductible gift furthers important work at Dinosaur National Monument. Private donations help preserve the various natural and cultural resources, maintain trails, and provide brochures and interpretive programs each year. Donations may be dedicated to enhancing specific activities, such as visitor services, educational programs, trail maintenance, tamarisk eradication, research, or scientific study. These can be made by check or money order, payable to: National Park Service Park Superintendent Dinosaur National Monument 4545 Highway 40 Dinosaur, CO 81610
